attributes.action: Scrap the backdated car tax increases for cars registered before 2006
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Scrap the proposed increases in vehicle excise duty for vehicles registered before 2006 as this unfairly penalises many people who own cars over 3 years old. Making this increase retrospective does not give people choice as many could not afford to buy a vehicle with a lower Co2 rating. It would also make older cars unsellable due to the higher VED rates payable.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
